resources.string: I-Mzansi Lingo iyisicelo sokufunda ulimi esisebenza kumakhalekhukhwini, esihlanganisa injabulo yokufunda negugu lezilimi ezihlukene zaseNingizimu Afrika. Sinikeza izifundo ezilimini eziyisikhombisa ezisemthethweni zaseNingizimu Afrika: isiZulu, isiXhosa, Sesotho, Setswana, Sepedi, isi-Afrikaans, nesiNgisi.

Uhlelo lwethu luhlanganisa ukufunda okufana nomdlalo, ukuzizwisa isiko, nezivivinyo zokukhuluma ezisebenzayo ukusiza abasebenzisi bakhe ulwazi lwegama, uhlelo lolimi, namakhono enkulumo. Sakhelwe izakhamuzi kanye nezivakashi, sikhuthaza ukusebenzisa izilimi eziningi nokuxhumana kwamasiko kulo lonke elaseNingizimu Afrika.

Izilaleli zethu eziyinhloko zihlanganisa izakhamuzi zaseNingizimu Afrika, abavakashi, abahlali bangaphandle, nabafundi abanentshisekelo yokufunda izilimi zasemakhaya ukuze bathuthukise isiko, ukukhula komsebenzi, noma ukuxhumana komuntu siqu. Samukela wonke umuntu onentshisekelo ngezilimi namasiko aseNingizimu Afrika.

üéÆ Ukufunda Okusekelwe Kumdlalo: Imiklomelo emnandi njengamaphuzu, ama-badge, nezinhlekelele kwenza ukufunda kujabulise futhi kudonsele ngendlela enhle.

üèÜ Amabhodi Abaholi & Ukubekwa Kwezinga: Qhathanisa inqubekela yakho nabangani nabanye abafundi ukukhuthaza umfutho nomoya womphakathi.

üìÖ Izinhloso Zansuku Zonke & Izikhumbuzo: Beka izinhloso zansuku zonke futhi uthole izikhumbuzo zokwakha imikhuba yokufunda ethembekile naphezu kwezimiso ezimatasatasa.

üìö Uhlelo Lolimi & Amazinga Okwazi: Izifundo ziyaqhubeka kusukela kwabaqalayo kuya kwabaphezulu ngezinyathelo ezicacile, zakha ukuzethemba futhi kwenze inqubekela phambili ilula ukulandelela.

üó£Ô∏è Ukufunda Okugxile Ekukhulumeni: Imisebenzi yokukhuluma, ukuhlola ukuphimisa, nezingxoxo ze-AI zithuthukisa ukuzethemba kokukhuluma kwangempela, hhayi nje igama.

üåç Ukuhlanganiswa Kwamasiko: Funda izilimi ngokwesimo sazo samasiko ukuze uthole ukuqonda okujulile nokwazisa.

I-rhinoceros yethu eluhlaza enobungane emele umoya waseNingizimu Afrika. Ngamehlo amakhulu ayindilinga, ukumamatheka okujabulisayo, nempondo ezimhlophe, i-mascot yethu ye-rhino imela ubuntu obufinyelelekayo nobumnandi bokufunda ulimi ngesikhathi ixhuma nobunikazi baseNingizimu Afrika.

Sibona iNingizimu Afrika lapho imigoqo yolimi iyizibuko zokuqonda, lapho lonke isakhamuzi singaxhumana phakathi kwezehlukaniso zamasiko, futhi lapho ukuhluka kwethu kwezilimi kuba amandla ethu amakhulu. Ngokusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe nokusungula, senza ukufunda ulimi kufinyeleleke kuwo wonke umuntu.

Yenziwe ngo-‚ù§Ô∏è yaseNingizimu Afrika

Ek het hulp nodig. Kan jy my help?
Ek is verlore. Kan jy my help?
Ayikho i-app etholakele yokuvula amafayela e-PDF
Ayikho imiphumela yokuhlola etholakele komsebenzisi wamanje
Kulayishwe imiphumela yokuhlola engu-%d komsebenzisi wamanje

Omusha kuhlelo lokufunda ulimi lwethu? Qala ngokwakha iphrofayela yakho, ukhethe ulimi lwakho eliqondiwe, futhi uthathe ukuhlolwa kwendawo ukuze unqume izinga lakho lamanje. Uhlelo lwethu lokufunda oluzijwayeza luzodala indlela yokufunda eyenziwe kuwe.

Ungakwazi ukubuyekeza ulwazi lwephrofayela yakho, ushintshe iphasiwedi yakho, futhi uphathe ukubhalisela kwakho kusuka kumenyu Yezilungiselelo. Ukuze ubuyise iphasiwedi yakho, thepha \'Ukhohlwe Iphasiwedi\' esikrinini sokungena futhi ulandele imiyalelo ethunyelwe ku-imeyili yakho.

Uhlelo lwethu lunikeza izifundo ezisebenzisanayo, ukuzijwayeza amagama, ukuqeqeshwa kokuphimisa, nokuqonda kwamasiko. Sebenzisa izinselelo zansuku zonke ukuze ugcine ukulandelana kwakho, futhi ungakhohlwa ukubuyekeza into oyifunde ngaphambili ukuze uqinise ukugcinwa kwenkumbulo yakho.

Uma ubhekene nokuwela, izinkinga zokulayisha, noma izinkinga zomsindo, zama ukuqala kabusha uhlelo, uhlole ukuxhumeka kwakho ku-inthanethi, futhi uqiniseke ukuthi unohlobo lwakamuva olufakiwe. Sula i-cache yohlelo uma izinkinga ziqhubeka.

Phatha ukubhalisela kwakho ngesitolo se-app yedivayisi lakho (i-Google Play Store noma i-Apple App Store). Ungakwazi ukuthuthukisa, wehlise, noma ukhansele ukubhalisela kwakho noma nini. Izinqubomgomo zokubuyisela imali zilawulwa yimigomo yesitolo ngasinye se-app.

Landelela uhambo lwakho lokufunda nge-tab Yenqubekela Phambili. Buka ukulandelana kwakho kwansuku zonke, izifundo eziqediwe, amagama aphethwe, nezinga lakho lonke lobuchule. Beka izinhloso zansuku zonke futhi uthole izaziso ukuze uhlale ugqugquzeleke futhi ungaguquki ekufundeni kwakho.

Layisha izifundo ukuze uzisebenzise ungaxhunyiwe uma unokuxhumeka okuzinzile ku-inthanethi. Izifundo ezingaxhunyiwe zihlanganisa ukuzivocavoca okusekelwe embhalweni nomsindo olayishwe ngaphambili. Inqubekela yakho izovumelanisa ngokuzenzakalelayo lapho uphinde uxhuma ku-inthanethi.

U: Ngingafunda izilimi eziningi?
I: Yebo! Ungangeza izilimi eziningi kuphrofayela yakho futhi ushintshe phakathi kwazo.

U: Zinde kangakanani izifundo?
I: Izifundo zisukela emizuzwini emi-5 kuya kweyishumi nanhlanu, zilungele ukuzijwayeza kwansuku zonke.

U: Ngingasebenzisa uhlelo ngaphandle kwe-inthanethi?
I: Yebo, ngokuqukethwe okulayishiwe okungaxhunyiwe.

Usadinga usizo? Ithimba lethu lokusekela lilungele ukukusiza:

I-imeyili: mzansilingo@gmail.com
Ifoni: 1234567890
Ikheli: 123 Smith Street

Hlola ulwazi lwakho ngemibuzo eyi-10 yokukhethwa. Ayidingi i-inthanethi!
Toets jou kennis met 10 veelvuldige keuse vrae. Geen internet nodig nie!

Siqoqa ulwazi olunikeza ngqo kithi, njengalapho udala i-akhawunti, usebenzisa izici zethu zokufunda ulimi, noma usithinta ukuze uthole usizo. Lokhu kungase kuhlanganise igama lakho, ikheli le-imeyili, inqubekela phambili yokufunda, nezintandokazi zakho.

Sisebenzisa ulwazi esiluqoqayo ukuze sinikeze, silondoloze, futhi sithuthukise amasevisi ethu okufunda ulimi, silandelele inqubekela yakho yokufunda, senze isipiliyoni sakho somuntu siqu, futhi sixhumane nawe mayelana ne-akhawunti yakho namasevisi ethu.

Sifaka izinyathelo zokuphepha ezifanele ukuvikela ulwazi lwakho lomuntu siqu ngokumelene nokufinyelela okungagunyaziwe, ukuguqulwa, ukwembulwa, noma ukubhujiswa. Idatha yakho ibethelwe kokubili ekuthunyelweni nasekuphumuleni kusetshenziswa amaphrothikholi asekelwe embonini.

Asithengisi, asishintshi, noma noma siyidlulisele kanjani ulwazi lwakho lomuntu siqu kwezinye izinkampani ngaphandle kwemvume yakho, ngaphandle njengoba kuchazwe kule nqubomgomo. Singabelana ngolwazi nabahlinzeki bamasevisi abasisizayo ekusebenziseni uhlelo lwethu nasekuhlinzekeni ngamasevisi kuwe.

Sigcina ulwazi lwakho isikhathi eside ngendlela edingakalayo ukukunikeza amasevisi ethu futhi njengoba kuchazwe kule nqubomgomo. Ungacela ukususwa kwe-akhawunti yakho nedatha ehlotshanisiwe noma nini ngokusithinta.

Unelungelo lokufinyelela, lokubuyekeza, noma lokususa ulwazi lwakho lomuntu siqu. Ungase futhi ukhethe ukungaphumeli kwezokuxhumana ezithile ezivela kithi. Uma unemibuzo mayelana namalungelo akho obumfihlo, sicela usithinte.

Isevisi yethu ayihloselwe izingane ezingaphansi kweminyaka engu-13 ubudala. Asiqoqi ngokwazi ulwazi lomuntu siqu ezinganeni ezingaphansi kweminyaka engu-13. Uma siqaphela ukuthi siqoqe ulwazi lomuntu siqu engane engaphansi kweminyaka engu-13, sizothatha izinyathelo zokususa lolo lwazi.

Singase sibuyekeze le nqubomgomo yobumfihlo ngezikhathi ezithile. Sizokwazisa nganoma yiziphi izinguquko ngokuthumela inqubomgomo entsha kuleli khasi nokubuyekeza usuku lwe-\'Ibuyekeziwe kamuva\'. Ukuqhubeka kwakho kokusebenzisa isevisi yethu ngemva kwanoma yiziphi izinguquko kusho ukwamukelwa kwenqubomgomo entsha.

Uma unemibuzo mayelana nale Nqubomgomo Yobumfihlo noma nemikhuba yethu, sicela usithinte ku:

I-imeyili: mzansilingo@gmail.com
Ifoni: 1234567890
Ikheli: 123 Smith Street
